name: Limitation of powers
text: §266-4  Limitation of powers.  The jurisdiction and powers conferred on the department of transportation are subject to such restrictions as may be imposed by the statutes of the State, and shall be exercised in accordance with the provisions thereof. [March 28, 1916, c 54, §4, 39 Stat 41; RL 1925, §837; RL 1935, §1735; RL 1945, §4985; RL 1955, §112-6; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §26; HRS §266-4]
